Title: Perfect Strangers
Writer: Álex de la Iglesia (screenplay), Jorge Guerricaechevarría (screenplay), Filippo Bologna (based on the movie written by), Paolo Costella (based on the movie written by), Paolo Genovese (based on the movie written by), Paola Mammini (based on the movie written by), Rolando Ravello (based on the movie written by)
Actors: Belén Rueda, Eduard Fernández, Ernesto Alterio, Juana Acosta
Plot: Seven friends gather for dinner and decide to play a game in which all incoming messages and calls will be on display for the entire group, leading to a series of revelations that gradually unravels their 'normal' lives.
